com.dua3.meja.model

Interface Workbook

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Iterable<Sheet>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GenericWorkbook, PoiWorkbook, PoiWorkbook.PoiHssfWorkbook, PoiWorkbook.PoiXssfWorkbook

    public interface Workbook
extends java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Iterable<Sheet>
    Workbook class.

    A workbook consists of different sheets which can be accessed by number or name. Use one of the concrete implementations of WorkbookFactory to read a workbook from disk.

    • Method Detail

      • getUri

        java.util.Optional<java.net.URI> getUri()
        Get the URI for this workbook.

        When a workbook is opened, the URI is set so that it can be used to later save the file back to the same location.

        Returns:
        the URI for this workbook

      • setUri

        void setUri(java.net.URI uri)
        Set URI for this workbook. See getUri().
        Parameters:
        uri - the URI to set.

      • write

        void write(FileType fileType,
           java.io.OutputStream out)
    throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the workbook to a stream.
        Parameters:
        fileType - the file type to use
        out - output stream to write to

      • write

        boolean write(java.io.File file,
              boolean overwriteIfExists)
       throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the workbook to a file.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to write to.

        The file format to used is determined by the extension of file which must be one of the extensions defined in FileType.

        overwriteIfExists - set to true if an existing file should be overwritten
        Returns:
        true if workbook was written to file, otherwise false
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
